channel.title: Server messages problem
channel.description: Hey, im running atomicscape 562 source. and im really wondering how to get rid of the server messages. for example when your playing it says: SERVER: Vote for atomic scape... an so on. Im just wondering if anyone knows how to change this or delete it. thanks, Nardoscape

item.title: Server messages problem
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

You open up you atomic source folder and click on “src” folder then “com” folder then “rs2hd” folder then “model” folder and open up player.java file.
Search for

if(serverMess > 0) and under that you will see

if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 0){ serverMess1 = 1; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Join Up At The AtomicScape Forums At Atomic-Scape.Tk!."); serverMess = 60; } The line that you see the

[code]getActionSender().sendMessage
is what does the server spam.

To stop it you could delete it or mark it out[/code]

/* if(serverMess > 0){ serverMess--; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 0){ serverMess1 = 1; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Join Up At The AtomicScape Forums At Atomic-Scape.Tk!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 1){ serverMess1 = 2; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Vote For AtmicScape On The google Status Page!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 2){ serverMess1 = 3; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>To Use Bank Go To Graphic Option And Click On Fixed Not Resisable!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 3){ serverMess1 = 4; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Respect All Mods And Admins, Enjoy The Server!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 4){ serverMess1 = 0; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Safe Pking Home. Dangerous Pking ::Edge And ::Dragpk!."); serverMess = 60; }*/

there it is bro’s…

Read full topic

item.title: Server messages problem
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Only if I was on my pc, I think it is in server.java! Press ctrl + f and type in vote and click find. It should be there

Read full topic

item.title: Server messages problem
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

It really should be in your “Client.java”. Are you sure you searched it correctly, you need too search the exact words and letters for your “Client.java” too find it.

If in fact it still can’t find it. Look in “TextHandler.java” If not their look in “clickingMost”.

Did this still not work? Check every server file and search for what it actually says.

Read full topic

item.title: Server messages problem
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

Try this.
Go into your sources client and search this SERVER: Vote for atomic scape
or whatever the thing is saying exactly.
Then just change it to what you want.
It’s what i did so it should work.
Hope this helps.
